refnamediv.refpurpose: Determines whether or not skill level elements are visible in formatted output

refsect1.title: Applies To
refsect1.para: This parameter controls the formatting of the level element in all output formats. It only applies when the level is contained in a skill.

refsect1.title: Possible Values
refsect1.para: Possible values include 1 (display the element) or 0 (suppress the element).

listitem.para: level elements contained in skills are displayed after all of the rest of the content of the skill. The level is displayed surrounded by skills.level.start and skills.level.end (parenthesis, by default).
level elements contained in skills are suppressed; they are treated as if the didn't exist for formatting purposes.
